thread.section_title: Cherry Tree Design Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cherry Tree Design | cherrytreedesign.com
thread.title: Steven W.
thread.title_full: Cherry Tree Design reviewed by Steven W.

author: Steven W.
title: Steven W.
text: I am very happy with Cherry Tree Design and my experience with the company was outstanding. Most importantly, the shoji screens look great! The craftsmanship and materials used are of very high quality. I did have an issue with the mounting shelf being damaged during transportation, but I called and they took care of it the next day. The customer service is very responsive and I was happy with how they took care of the issue. I thought the Cherry Tree Design website was very informative and the instructions that came with the product were clear and straightforward.
